topic.title: Create your own Sub
topic.body:
Taken from [this Zerotalk thread](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:9_1CMYxdit4qq9QGk9DYRu2ruRPd2YDGckH8/How+can+I+create+subforums+like+the+P2P+Newsflow+subcategory)

```
{
  "body": "Articles about Bitcoin, Torrent and Peer To Peer networks", 
  "added": 1436262090, 
  "type": "group", 
  "topic_id": 1, 
  "title": "P2P news flow"
}, 
```

you probably have to go to your user folder manually and add the "type": "group", to your data.json

nano data/1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT/data/users/<userid>/data.json

and you have to obviously sign it afterwards â€¦ editing a topic / comment here should also do

topic.body: What do you think? Who do you support? Why?
